OUR SCHOOL

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29″ custom_padding=”||22px|||” bottom_divider_style=”curve2″ bottom_divider_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29%22:%91%22background_color%22%93}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||52px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_perspective_image src=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/WELCOME-DIRECTOR-e1708001321760.webp” title_text=”WELCOME DIRECTOR” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”70%” border_radii=”on|999px|999px|999px|999px” border_width_all=”8px” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_perspective_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”32px” text_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

WELCOME TO THE ALTAMIRA INTERNATIONAL SCHOOL

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We are more than just a place of learning; we are a community that nurtures values, encourages excellence, and fosters a love for life’s diverse experiences. We are dedicated to preparing our students for a future that demands not only knowledge but also character, compassion, creativity, and the ability to be agents of change.

Together, we are shaping a brighter future for our students and our world.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”13px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Mrs. Priscilla Ruiz de Vergara
School Director

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”17px|||||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”|auto|8px|auto||” custom_padding=”41px||5px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29″ text_font_size=”38px” custom_margin=”||17px|||” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29%22:%91%22text_text_color%22%93}”]

WHO WE ARE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”-16px|||||” custom_padding=”||6px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”34px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”3px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29″ animation_style=”fade” hover_transition_speed_curve=”ease-in” border_radii=”on|26px|26px|26px|26px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29%22:%91%22background_color%22%93}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”28px” custom_margin=”45px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

MISSION

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Montserrat|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”|30px|45px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We create opportunities for discovery and reflection by engaging the minds, hands and hearts of our students to inspire in them the curiosity to learn, the self-confidence to Lead and the compassion to serve.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”gcid-c06f992e-1a1f-4a27-8457-39b06448a507″ animation_style=”fade” border_radii=”on|26px|26px|26px|26px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-c06f992e-1a1f-4a27-8457-39b06448a507%22:%91%22background_color%22%93}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”28px” custom_margin=”45px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

VISION

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Montserrat||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”|30px|45px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

To become an inspirational, innovative and inviting school where our students are empowered to be college ready, globally competitive integral leaders, prepared to change the world

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”39px||15px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”28px|auto|40px|auto||” custom_padding=”34px|||||” border_radii=”on|26px|26px|26px|26px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29″ text_font_size=”38px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||35px|||” custom_padding=”||14px|||” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29%22:%91%22text_text_color%22%93}”]OUR HISTORY[/et_pb_text][dipi_horizontal_timeline layout=”bottom” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dipi_horizontal_timeline_item ribbon=”1992″ image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Diseno-sin-titulo-17.webp” ribbon_last_edited=”off|desktop” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Grand opening of the Bilingual Kid’s Korner Nursery School

[/dipi_horizontal_timeline_item][dipi_horizontal_timeline_item ribbon=”1993″ image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Diseno-sin-titulo-18.webp” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Name change to American Korner Learning Center.

[/dipi_horizontal_timeline_item][dipi_horizontal_timeline_item ribbon=”1994″ image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Diseno-sin-titulo-19.webp” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The owners (Priscilla Ruiz de Vergara and her husband, Henry Vergara Munárriz) decided to continue growing as a PK-12th grade school.

[/dipi_horizontal_timeline_item][dipi_horizontal_timeline_item ribbon=”1995″ image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Diseno-sin-titulo-34.webp” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The nursery, the growing first and second grade sections, MOVED to the new location situated at Cra. 50 # 79-136.

[/dipi_horizontal_timeline_item][dipi_horizontal_timeline_item ribbon=”1996″ image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Diseno-sin-titulo-35.webp” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Expansion of the new location rental of the adjacent house at the address Cra. 50 # 79-136.

[/dipi_horizontal_timeline_item][dipi_horizontal_timeline_item ribbon=”1997″ image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Diseno-sin-titulo-32.webp” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Acquisition of the land for the construction of the new rural campus.

[/dipi_horizontal_timeline_item][dipi_horizontal_timeline_item ribbon=”1998″ image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Diseno-sin-titulo-33.webp” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Approval from the ministry of education as a preschool, primary, and secondary education center.

[/dipi_horizontal_timeline_item][dipi_horizontal_timeline_item ribbon=”1999″ image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Diseno-sin-titulo-39.webp” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Beginning of construction of the new rural campus located at km 10, Puerto Colombia highway.

[/dipi_horizontal_timeline_item][dipi_horizontal_timeline_item ribbon=”2000″ image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Diseno-sin-titulo-40.webp” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Name change to Altamira International School.

[/dipi_horizontal_timeline_item][/dipi_horizontal_timeline][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||16px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29″ text_font_size=”38px” min_height=”20.4px” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29%22:%91%22text_text_color%22%93}”]

OUR IDENTITY

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1280px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_flipbox flipbox_height=”340px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” content_text_color=”#000000″ border_radii=”on|26px|26px|26px|26px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_flipbox_child image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Diseno-sin-titulo-22.png” image_max_width=”74%” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#002452″ background_enable_color=”on” custom_padding=”15px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_header_level=”h4″][/dsm_flipbox_child][dsm_flipbox_child title=”INTERCULTURAL EDUCATION” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”18px” content_font=”|300|||||||” content_text_align=”center” content_text_color=”#000000″ content_font_size=”16px” content_line_height=”1.4em” custom_padding=”|10px||10px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_header_level=”h4″]

An internationally-focused education emphasizing Spanish/English language proficiency, offering a holistic educational approach with an inclusive ethos. Our environment fosters respect and appreciation for cultural diversity across both contexts.

[/dsm_flipbox_child][/dsm_flipbox][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_flipbox flipbox_height=”340px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|26px|26px|26px|26px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_flipbox_child image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/Diseno-sin-titulo-25.png” image_max_width=”74%” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#002452″ background_enable_color=”on” custom_padding=”15px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_header_level=”h4″][/dsm_flipbox_child][dsm_flipbox_child title=”LEADERSHIP” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”18px” content_font=”|300|||||||” content_text_align=”center” content_text_color=”#000000″ content_font_size=”16px” content_line_height=”1.4em” custom_padding=”|10px||10px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_header_level=”h4″]

Our Students need to develop leadership skills through its permanence in the school in order to be able to make use of them in their future life.

[/dsm_flipbox_child][/dsm_flipbox][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_flipbox flipbox_height=”340px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|26px|26px|26px|26px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_flipbox_child image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/Diseno-sin-titulo-23.png” image_max_width=”70%” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#002452″ background_enable_color=”on” custom_padding=”15px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_header_level=”h4″][/dsm_flipbox_child][dsm_flipbox_child title=”FAMILY PARTICIPATION” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”18px” content_font=”|300|||||||” content_text_align=”center” content_text_color=”#000000″ content_font_size=”16px” content_line_height=”1.4em” custom_padding=”|10px||10px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_header_level=”h4″]

The integration of the school and the family fosters coherence in information and education imparted, leading to the construction and execution of a shared vision and common project

[/dsm_flipbox_child][/dsm_flipbox][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_flipbox flipbox_height=”340px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|26px|26px|26px|26px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_flipbox_child image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/Diseno-sin-titulo-29.png” image_max_width=”80%” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#002452″ background_enable_color=”on” custom_padding=”15px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_header_level=”h4″][/dsm_flipbox_child][dsm_flipbox_child title=”KNOWLEDGE” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”18px” content_font=”|300|||||||” content_text_align=”center” content_text_color=”#000000″ content_font_size=”16px” content_line_height=”1.4em” custom_padding=”|10px||10px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_header_level=”h4″]

Knowledge and information should be accessible to all students with the purpose of stimulating innovation, facilitating improvements in decision-making, and generating new knowledge. Information and communication technologies have provided invaluable tools for establishing knowledge foundations.

[/dsm_flipbox_child][/dsm_flipbox][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||16px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29″ text_font_size=”38px” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29%22:%91%22text_text_color%22%93}”]

OUR SYMBOLS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1280px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_flipbox flipbox_height=”360px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” content_text_color=”#000000″ border_radii=”on|26px|26px|26px|26px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_flipbox_child image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/android-chrome-192×192-1.png” image_max_width=”74%” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” background_enable_color=”on” custom_padding=”15px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_header_level=”h4″][/dsm_flipbox_child][dsm_flipbox_child title=”INSTITUTIONAL SHIELD” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”18px” content_font=”|300|||||||” content_text_align=”center” content_text_color=”#000000″ content_font_size=”16px” content_line_height=”1.4em” custom_padding=”|10px||10px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_header_level=”h4″]

The emblem of our institution symbolizes the collaboration between family and school to enhance student development, equipping them with skills to comprehend a constantly changing world, fostering appreciation for both Colombian and American cultures, and nurturing leadership and emotional intelligence to empower them as agents of change in their lives and communities.

[/dsm_flipbox_child][/dsm_flipbox][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_flipbox flipbox_height=”360px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” content_text_color=”#000000″ border_radii=”on|26px|26px|26px|26px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_flipbox_child image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/sharky-control-academic-05-scaled.webp” image_max_width=”35%” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” background_enable_color=”on” custom_padding=”15px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_header_level=”h4″][/dsm_flipbox_child][dsm_flipbox_child title=”SCHOOL MASCOT” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”18px” content_font=”|300|||||||” content_text_align=”center” content_text_color=”#000000″ content_font_size=”16px” content_line_height=”1.4em” custom_padding=”|10px||10px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}” parent_header_level=”h4″]

the Altamira Shark, embodies resilience and forward-thinking. Inspired by the mantra “Sharks never stop moving forward,” it encourages perseverance in the face of challenges. Similarly, “Sharks never look down; they always look up” promotes a positive outlook and a focus on success. As responsible Altamira Sharks, students are expected to uphold values of safety, honesty, accountability, respect, and kindness.

[/dsm_flipbox_child][/dsm_flipbox][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_flipbox flipbox_height=”360px” CODE OF HONOR

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”900px” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”RESPONSIBLE BEHAVIOR:” image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Recurso-7.png” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”37px” content_max_width=”400px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#373737″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”14px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_blurb_image=”padding-right: 10px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Use of self-control in your actions and language.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”MUTUAL RESPECT:” image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Recurso-8-1.png” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”45px” content_max_width=”400px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#373737″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”14px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_blurb_image=”padding-right: 10px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Treat yourself and others with care and consideration.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”CONCERN FOR OTHERS:” image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Recurso-9.png” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”45px” content_max_width=”400px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#373737″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”14px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_blurb_image=”padding-right: 10px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Be truthful, honest and fair in your dealings with others.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”COOPERATION WITH OTHERS:” image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Recurso-10-2.png” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”45px” content_max_width=”400px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#373737″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”14px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_blurb_image=”padding-right: 10px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Participate positively and actively in every class and/or educational activities.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”PERSONAL EXCELLENCE:” image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Recurso-11-1.png” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”50px” content_max_width=”400px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#373737″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”14px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_blurb_image=”padding-right: 10px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Put forth your best effort in whatever you attempt.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”ACADEMIC HONESTY:” image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Recurso-11-1.png” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”50px” content_max_width=”400px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#373737″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”14px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_blurb_image=”padding-right: 10px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Be honest in all academic work and refrain from cheating or plagiarism.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”HEALTH AND WELL-BEING:” image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Recurso-13-1.png” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”50px” content_max_width=”400px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#373737″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”14px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_blurb_image=”padding-right: 10px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Stay free of usage of alcohol, tobacco and other controlled substances.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”PERSONAL PRESENTATION:” image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Recurso-14-1.png” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”50px” content_max_width=”400px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#373737″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”14px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_blurb_image=”padding-right: 10px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dress appropriately for school and follow uniform policy.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.06)” background_image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/Recurso-2@2x-100-2.jpg” background_blend=”multiply” custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” disabled=”on” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”50px|50px|50px|50px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|800|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#B21822″ header_3_font_size=”30px” custom_margin=”||5px||false|false” header_3_font_size_tablet=”” header_3_font_size_phone=”18px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

DISCIPLINE CHAPTER

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”18px” text_font_size_tablet=”18px” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”] [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|800|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#B21822″ header_3_font_size=”30px” custom_margin=”||5px||false|false” header_3_font_size_tablet=”” header_3_font_size_phone=”18px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

BRING YOUR OWN DEVICE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”18px” text_font_size_tablet=”18px” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”] [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered:
OUR SCHOOL

WELCOME TO THE ALTAMIRA INTERNATIONAL SCHOOLWe are more than just a place of learning; we are a community that nurtures values, encourages excellence, and fosters a love for life’s diverse experiences. We are dedicated to preparing our students for a future that demands not only knowledge but also character, compassion, creativity, and the ability to be agents of change. Together, we are shaping a brighter future for our students and our world.Mrs. Priscilla Ruiz de VergaraSchool DirectorWHO WE AREMISSIONWe create opportunities for discovery and reflection by engaging the minds, hands and hearts of our students to inspire in them the curiosity to learn, the self-confidence to Lead and the compassion to serve.VISIONTo become an inspirational, innovative and inviting school where our students are empowered to be college ready, globally competitive integral leaders, prepared to change the worldOUR HISTORY
1992
Grand opening of the Bilingual Kid’s Korner Nursery School
1993
Name change to American Korner Learning Center.
1994
The owners (Priscilla Ruiz de Vergara and her husband, Henry Vergara Munárriz) decided to continue growing as a […]
